content: this crochet caddy is a speedy project thanks to bernat blanket yarn worked flat in single_crochet this clever piece requires one quick fold and a little slip_stitch seaming to create a deep pocket where you can hide away remotes magazines and more dressed up with a bit of fringe across the bottom edge this modern piece is both functional and decorative it s a fun project for practicing single_crochet treble_crochet chain stitch fringe slip_stitch seaming working in the back loop only and more you ll love it in the family room video tutorial by jonah s hands https //www youtube com/watch v=z29p9kf-jo0
